程序包 Controller

类 TransactionController

java.lang.Object
Controller.TransactionController
public class TransactionController extends Object
Controller class for managing transactions in a financial management application. It handles operations such as adding, removing, importing, and reading transactions stored in a CSV file. The class also provides functionality to detect abnormal transactions and supports parsing entities into transaction records.
版本:
1.0
作者:
Group 19

  • 方法详细资料

    • ensureFileExists

      private static void ensureFileExists()
      Ensures the transaction CSV file exists, creating it with the header if it does not. Displays an error message if file creation fails.

    • hasAbnormalTransactions

      public static boolean hasAbnormalTransactions(String username, List<Transaction> transactions)
      Checks for abnormal transactions for a given user based on the provided transaction list. An abnormal transaction is defined as a "Transfer Out" or "Transfer In" with an amount exceeding 500.
      参数:
      username - The username to check transactions for.
      transactions - The list of transactions to analyze.
      返回:
      true if an abnormal transaction is found, false otherwise.

    • importTransactions

      public static int importTransactions(File sourceFile, String destinationFilePath) throws IOException, IllegalArgumentException
      Imports transactions from a source CSV file to the destination file, validating the header and data.
      参数:
      sourceFile - The source CSV file containing transactions.
      destinationFilePath - The destination file path to append valid transactions.
      返回:
      The number of transactions successfully imported.
      抛出:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during file reading or writing.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the source file has an invalid header or lacks valid data.

    • addTransaction

      public static boolean addTransaction(String username, String operation, double amount, String time, String merchant, String type)
      Adds a transaction with minimal required fields to the CSV file.
      参数:
      username - The username associated with the transaction.
      operation - The operation type (e.g., "Income", "Expense").
      amount - The transaction amount.
      time - The timestamp of the transaction.
      merchant - The merchant involved in the transaction.
      type - The transaction type.
      返回:
      true if the transaction was added successfully, false otherwise.

    • addTransaction

      public static boolean addTransaction(String username, String operation, double amount, String time, String merchant, String type, String remark, String category, String paymentMethod, String location, String tag, String attachment, String recurrence)
      Adds a transaction with all possible fields to the CSV file, validating and normalizing the data.
      参数:
      username - The username associated with the transaction.
      operation - The operation type (e.g., "Income", "Expense").
      amount - The transaction amount.
      time - The timestamp of the transaction.
      merchant - The merchant involved in the transaction.
      type - The transaction type.
      remark - Additional remarks for the transaction.
      category - The category of the transaction.
      paymentMethod - The payment method used.
      location - The location of the transaction.
      tag - Tags associated with the transaction.
      attachment - Any attachment details for the transaction.
      recurrence - Recurrence details for the transaction.
      返回:
      true if the transaction was added successfully, false otherwise.

    • addTransactionFromEntities

      public boolean addTransactionFromEntities(User user, Map<String,String> entities)
      Adds a transaction to the CSV file by mapping entities extracted from external input.
      参数:
      user - The current user.
      entities - A map of entity names to their values, containing at least operation, amount, and timestamp.
      返回:
      true if the transaction was added successfully.
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - If required fields are missing or invalid.
      RuntimeException - If the transaction cannot be recorded.

    • removeTransaction

      public static boolean removeTransaction(String username, String time)
      Removes a transaction from the CSV file based on the username and timestamp.
      参数:
      username - The username associated with the transaction.
      time - The timestamp of the transaction to remove.
      返回:
      true if the transaction was removed successfully, false otherwise.

    • readTransactions

      public static List<Transaction> readTransactions(String username)
      Reads all transactions for a specific user from the CSV file.
      参数:
      username - The username whose transactions are to be retrieved.
      返回:
      A list of Transaction objects for the specified user.

    • readAllTransactions

      public static List<Transaction> readAllTransactions()
      Reads all transactions from the CSV file, regardless of the user.
      返回:
      A list of all Transaction objects in the CSV file.

    • escapeCsvField

      private static String escapeCsvField(String field)
      Escapes a CSV field to handle commas, quotes, and newlines.
      参数:
      field - The field to escape.
      返回:
      The escaped field, or an empty string if the field is null.

    • unescapeCsvField

      private static String unescapeCsvField(String field)
      Unescapes a CSV field to remove surrounding quotes and handle escaped quotes.
      参数:
      field - The field to unescape.
      返回:
      The unescaped field, or an empty string if the field is null.
